ModMetadata.Name: AlwaysActiveGeysers
ModMetadata.Author: Grilled_Salmon
ModMetadata.Description:
WARNING: This mod will not work, unless you install Stationeers.Addon mod loader. Read how to install it here: https://github.com/Erdroy/Stationeers.Addons ---
An addon that overrides the vanilla behavior of unloaded geysers, and makes them produce gas even when not visible.
